well said...also we all are learning here. If you can't open your mind, the=
n maybe this isn't for you. I believe this ITC in not our eyes playing tric=
ks etc etc.. This big here! open your eyes and your mind. We all should kno=
w by now spirit manipulates things. Smoke,clouds,etc.=C2=A0I don't see how =
this can be any different. 

--- On Sun, 12/19/10, Frank Sumption <purpleal=
iengirl@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...=

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ok so im getting stuff on the spectergram

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

=C2=A0 
=




=C2=A0Okay, that was harsh! Put my claws back in. Been doing this stuff=
=C2=A0for ten years and there's always someone that thinks they are somehow=
 more qualified and more intelligent than anyone else. I've been doing EVP =
related work for ten years, that does not mean I have had no other experien=
ce, have not read a butt load of books, and have no intuition-. I've been h=
aving "paranormal expereince" before most of=C2=A0the people on this group =
were born, and it really pisses me off to be talked down to.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0I say the images are real, and are not at all rare, and once again I =
state--we are the ones with all the limitations! If someone on the other si=
de has been working on technology for 1000 years, how simple do you think i=
t is for them to embed images in every and any=C2=A0freaking thing they wan=
t to? Forget the Hollywood nonsense of spirit being a deminished human zomb=
ie incapable of any action on this side.
=C2=A0
F-S
=C2=A0
=C2=A0


=C2=A0
=
On Sun, Dec 19, 2010 at 4:54 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>=
 wrote:


=C2=A0I just don't like pompus A-holes coming down on everyone el=
se. That is exactly what you came across as, then you act you are somekind =
of ITC expert. 
=C2=A0
F-S





On Sun, Dec 19, 2010 at 3:49 PM, Tim Woolwo=
rth <tjwoolworth@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 



Frank, 


WTF?


Did I seco=
nd guess anyone? =C2=A0No.


Did I prejudge all evidence? =C2=A0No.


Was I=
 aware of this? =C2=A0Yes. =C2=A0Did I mention it before? =C2=A0No. =C2=A0W=
hy? =C2=A0Because it did not interest me until now because I did not know t=
he software was available for downloading.


You are putting a helluva lot =
of assumptions out there about me Frank, and you know me better than to eve=
r equate me with the TAPS bullshit. =C2=A0At least I thought you did.


All=
 I can ask is WTF? =C2=A0Can no one understand basic English in a freaking =
post anymore? =C2=A0


I attacked no one. =C2=A0I attacked no evidence. =C2=
=A0I did not give specific opinion about the validity of evidence until for=
ced to by Ursula's last post. =C2=A0I only said what I would need to quanti=
fy before I start posting images. =C2=A0And you have really jumped the shar=
k here, Frank, and I have no idea why.


Tim






On Sun, Dec 19, 2010 at =
5:10 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 




HU=
H? You've been aware of this for so long? That's another thing that gets me=
, people think they are such friggin' great experts that they prejudge all =
evidence and and second guess everyone. 

=C2=A0So this wasn't important en=
ough to mention, cuz you already judged it to be bogus? Everyone thinks the=
y are to world's onlyest freaking experts! GodAlmighty!! 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I wi=
th Hultay, shut down the groups and tell everyone bite me! Go join TAPS if =
you want all this to corespond to preconceived idiotic Hollywood shit!
=C2=
=A0
F-S



=C2=A0

=C2=A0
On Sun, Dec 19, 2010 at 7:31 AM, Tim Woolworth <t=
jwoolworth@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 



Relax Ursula. 


I too have been =
aware of this at Keith's site for long, long time, but like I said in the l=
ast post, I am very new to this as in doing it on my own computer. =C2=A0Ju=
st like you. =C2=A0So don't act like you know what I do and do not know, th=
ank you very much. =C2=A0


I am not attacking you so back the hell off. =
=C2=A0I made it clear that this was for my own own edification, for me to a=
ccept my own images.=C2=A0=C2=A0


The image I ever so briefly mentioned th=
e one posted that had several "Faces" or pieces thereof that were circled. =
=C2=A0As for your image of the man peeking out, I saw nothing there. =C2=A0=
Period. =C2=A0=C2=A0Did I say previously what I thought about the quality o=
f the images in that photo? =C2=A0No. =C2=A0I politely kept it to myself be=
cause I do not like to differ with people or to deflate hot air balloons. =
=C2=A0But there you have it, that is what I saw. =C2=A0And to my knowledge,=
 that is the only time I have described what I have seen thus far in your i=
mages other than mentioning the word "eyebrows." =C2=A0In the one that had =
many circles, I saw one that looked like a set of lips and a chin and the r=
est I personally thought was matrixing. =C2=A0Once again, did I saw this? =
=C2=A0No. =C2=A0But you asked for it so there it is.


The whole point of m=
y post, had you read it with a clear head. =C2=A0It was all about my own ed=
ification, that I, and I alone, need to keep plugging in files before I, an=
d I alone, make a judgement about MY images and whether they are real or no=
t based upon the images they provide in contrast to the bulk of other files=
. =C2=A0If you simply compare your one image with the many circles to the y=
outube file, I suspect I am correct in saying that faces occur with much mo=
re rarity than your circle file and that they can appear fully formed. =C2=
=A0Once again, I suspect, only, and I will only be able to tell after time.=
 =C2=A0Sample size is everything, and I thought I made that abundantly clea=
r. =C2=A0The post was simply about my process of learning rather than runni=
ng out and saying look what I found when I simply don't know what has been =
found yet because it is the first time I have played with the controls rath=
er than seeing the end snapshots on another persons website. =C2=A0


Why d=
o you always jump on the defensive and attack every one who does not fall i=
n line with you? =C2=A0Not everything has to be fight or flight, Ursula, an=
d not every bridge has to be burned so thoroughly to the ground. =C2=A0This=
 is not an attack on you or results, reread the post, and this time thinkin=
g a little more clearly about what is written on the page and not your own =
emotional backlash construing things in the posted text that are simply not=
 there. =C2=A0Had you done this, you would have seen the point of my post w=
as not an attack on you, in ANY way. =C2=A0 =C2=A0


Tim





On Sun, Dec 1=
9, 2010 at 12:03 AM, Ursula Kalin <kalinu@...> wrote:


=C2=A0

oo also they only image you saw me go crazy about was the mean man pe=

--- On Sat, 12/18/10, Tim Woolwort=
h <tjwoolworth@...> wrote:


From: Tim Woolworth <tjwoolworth@gmail.c=
om>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ok so im getting stuff on the spectergram
To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, December 18, 2010, 4:57 PM


=C2=
=A0 

No, I don't think I am being too critical, but I may have expectation=
s that are a little too high. =C2=A0I want to take my time with this. =C2=
=A0For my own understanding, I need to have a large sample size so I know n=
ot only what to expect to see, but what to look for. =C2=A0I have seen ITC =
snapshots from programs like this that offer full faces. =C2=A0I would be m=
ore inclined to believe in such an image as opposed to, lets say. two dark =
lines that may or may not be eyebrows. 


Even in your example of the towel=
, you get half a face. =C2=A0If you have half a face (on the vertical plane=
, not the horizontal) you can extrapolate out what the entire face would lo=
ok like. =C2=A0This is something I would like to get myself and I would con=
sider that evidence if it showed up in one of these programs. =C2=A0But, if=
 you have something that looks like a forehead and that is all there is, th=
en it could also look like a rock or some other such object.


I am certain=
ly hoping for results worked into box sessions. =C2=A0Directing a session w=
ith intent, like saying "I am going to examine the sound waves of this comm=
unication in hopes of seeing your face. =C2=A0Is it possible you can show y=
our face to me now through sound? " is what I am after. =C2=A0If a positive=
 hit like this happens, then I will be jumping for joy. =C2=A0Another good =
example would be a name, lets say Tom, that occurs. =C2=A0If you get a posi=
tive affirmation that the name you heard is present, then you try the same =
technique only you address Tom by name and get a face, that would be even b=
etter.


But, as it stands now, the faces as they appear are random at best=
. =C2=A0I would be more inclined to believe that when these faces do occur =
, they are going to occur with a lesser frequency than multiple images in a=
 few seconds of audio like Ursula's example. =C2=A0If this where the case, =
there would be dozens, and possibly hundreds, of faces during a ten minute =
session and I just don't think that is possible. =C2=A0This is why I need t=
o look at several samples to find out if this is the case or not. =C2=A0If =
these partialized faces occur in multiples all the time, I would be more ap=
t to discount it. =C2=A0But, if they are a rarity affixed to only a few cli=
ps out of dozens, I would be more inclined to believe in them. =C2=A0Sample=
 size is everything. =C2=A0It is like listening to GBC. =C2=A0If you have n=
ever done a session before, you would be inclined to believe every stray ra=
dio signal is a communication. =C2=A0Only by continued practice (expanding =
your sample size) can you start to
 rule out stray radio with any degree of=
 accuracy. =C2=A0


On the other hand, I am very new to this and I could ce=
rtainly be wrong. =C2=A0I will continue to plug sound into the programs and=
 hope for the best. =C2=A0


I really want this to work. =C2=A0As you have =
probably experienced, when they want you to hear something or know somethin=
g, they make it very obvious while communicating. =C2=A0I am hoping they ap=
ply this same rigor to this new format to show us that they are there. =C2=
=A0If they can, then the world of video and audio ITC will merge in one sou=
rce and then the skeptics be damned!


Tim


On Sat, Dec 18, 2010 at 2:24 P=
M, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0I =
think it's unrealistic to expect every file to have faces and images. These=
 faces are often just portions, eyes and lips, some have eye brows. Like al=
l of this, not done for proof, it's for emotional impact.=C2=A0 I have this=
 woman that shows up in towels, always just half the face. Perahps you are =
being too critical? As with all spirit messages, it's what it means to the =
experiencer that matters. Expecting full faces is like expecting the kings =
english and proper grammer in all EVPs. 
=C2=A0
F-S





On Sat, Dec 18, 20=
10 at 3:07 AM, Tim Woolworth <tjwoolworth@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 



I =
saw a couple which could be construed as images in the one series you had f=
rom SEA, but nothing that knocked me over the head yet. =C2=A0I am going to=
 have to see a larger sample size before I determine if what you have witne=
ssed is in fact a form or not. =C2=A0I cannot accept an image as paranormal=
 without knowing where it sits among the bulk of audio files. =C2=A0If ever=
y file has multiple faces, the I would have =C2=A0to say that there is noth=
ing there. 


So, I will certainly keep testing with my copy and hopefully =
something will really pop for me. =C2=A0I have run through about ten files =
(EVP and GBC) so far for intensive study and I still haven't got anything t=
hat I would consider a positive hit. =C2=A0I need an actual formed face, no=
t portions thereof, to consider an image real. =C2=A0This is the only way t=
o discount visual matrixing.


I have high hopes for this though!


Tim 


=

On Sat, Dec 18, 2010 at 1:00 AM, =
psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 



I've seen live we=
bcast of ITC sessions where GB output is fed directly into the mic line in =
on a computer running Adobe Audition with the spectragraph running. It was =
really compelling to see letters and numbers, not images or pictures, but p=
artial words appear in the graph. At first it was I thought it was a softwa=
re glitch but it is a repeatable event. It was on LiveSciFi which is run by=
 Tim Wood, he also thought there was some kind of code error but it happene=
d on more than one webcast. 

So if anyone has Audition, just feed Box outp=
ut right in your computer and see what happens. I wanted to try it tonight =
but I have Audacity and the spectragraph feature doesn't have that shaded a=
ppearance that Audition does so it's not able to render images or character=
s, at least as far as I see using the various settings.

hoogroups.com, Tim Woolworth <tjwoolworth@...> wrote:

 persons website.  </DIV>

;<BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: ok so im getting stuff on the spectergram<B=

010, 4:57 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV><SPAN> </SPAN> 
<DIV>
<DIV>No, I don't think=
 I am being too critical, but I may have expectations that are a little too=
 high.  I want to take my time with this.  For my own understandi=
ng, I need to have a large sample size so I know not only what to expect to=
 see, but what to look for.  I have seen ITC snapshots from programs l=
ike this that offer full faces.  I would be more inclined to believe i=
n such an image as opposed to, lets say. two dark lines that may or may not=
 be eyebrows. 
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>Even in your example of the towel, you =
get half a face.  If you have half a face (on the vertical plane, not =
the horizontal) you can extrapolate out what the entire face would look lik=
e.  This is something I would like to get myself and I would consider =
that evidence if it showed up in one of these programs.  But, if you h=
ave something that looks like a forehead and that is all there is, then it =
could also look like a rock or some other such object.</DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV=
>
<DIV>I am certainly hoping for results worked into box sessions.  Di=
recting a session with intent, like saying "I am going to examine the sound=
 waves of this communication in hopes of seeing your face.  Is it poss=
ible you can show your face to me now through sound? " is what I am after. =
 If a positive hit like this happens, then I will be jumping for joy. =
 Another good example would be a name, lets say Tom, that occurs. &nbs=
p;If you get a positive affirmation that the name you heard is present, the=
n you try the same technique only you address Tom by name and get a face, t=
hat would be even better.</DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>But, as it stands now,=
 the faces as they appear are random at best.  I would be more incline=
d to believe that when these faces do occur , they are going to occur with =
a lesser frequency than multiple images in a few seconds of audio like Ursu=
la's example.  If this where the case, there would be dozens, and poss=
ibly hundreds, of faces during a ten minute session and I just don't think =
that is possible.  This is why I need to look at several samples to fi=
nd out if this is the case or not.  If these partialized faces occur i=
n multiples all the time, I would be more apt to discount it.  But, if=
 they are a rarity affixed to only a few clips out of dozens, I would be mo=
re inclined to believe in them.  Sample size is everything.  It i=
s like listening to GBC.  If you have never done a session before, you=
 would be inclined to believe every stray radio signal is a communication. =
 Only by continued practice
 (expanding your sample size) can you star=
t to rule out stray radio with any degree of accuracy.  </DIV>
<DIV><B=
R></DIV>
<DIV>On the other hand, I am very new to this and I could certainl=
y be wrong.  I will continue to plug sound into the programs and hope =
for the best.  </DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>I really want this to work.=
  As you have probably experienced, when they want you to hear somethi=
ng or know something, they make it very obvious while communicating.  =
I am hoping they apply this same rigor to this new format to show us that t=
hey are there.  If they can, then the world of video and audio ITC wil=
l merge in one source and then the skeptics be damned!</DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV=
>
<DIV>Tim<BR><BR>

<DIV> I think it's unrealistic to expect e=
very file to have faces and images. These faces are often just portions, ey=
es and lips, some have eye brows. Like all of this, not done for proof, it'=
s for emotional impact.  I have this woman that shows up in towels, al=
ways just half the face. Perahps you are being too critical? As with all sp=
irit messages, it's what it means to the experiencer that matters. Expectin=
g full faces is like expecting the kings english and proper grammer in all =
EVPs. </DIV>

<DIV>I saw =
a couple which could be construed as images in the one series you had from =
SEA, but nothing that knocked me over the head yet.  I am going to hav=
e to see a larger sample size before I determine if what you have witnessed=
 is in fact a form or not.  I cannot accept an image as paranormal wit=
hout knowing where it sits among the bulk of audio files.  If every fi=
le has multiple faces, the I would have  to say that there is nothing =
there. </DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>So, I will certainly keep testing with m=
y copy and hopefully something will really pop for me.  I have run thr=
ough about ten files (EVP and GBC) so far for intensive study and I still h=
aven't got anything that I would consider a positive hit.  I need an a=
ctual formed face, not portions thereof, to consider an image real.  T=
his is the only way to discount visual matrixing.</DIV>
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DI=
V>I have high hopes for this though!</DIV>

appened on more than one webcast. <BR><BR>So if anyone has Audition, just f=

or characters, at least as far as I see using the various settings.</DIV>
